description:
cmd/godoc: initialize filesystem and metadata for -url

Unlike when using -http, godoc -url didn't initialize the "filesystem"
and metadata that are used when generating responses. This CL adds this
initialization, so that -url provides the same results as an HTTP
request when using -http.

Fixes issue 4335.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: speter.go1@gmail.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM. Have you signed the CLA?

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=9408d8d87a5a ***

cmd/godoc: initialize filesystem and metadata for -url

Unlike when using -http, godoc -url didn't initialize the "filesystem"
and metadata that are used when generating responses. This CL adds this
initialization, so that -url provides the same results as an HTTP
request when using -http.

Fixes issue 4335.

R=golang-dev, minux.ma
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6817075

Committer: Shenghou Ma <minux.ma@gmail.com>
